other_tests.findings: Complete lack of response, with LH and FSH serum levels remaining less than 0.1 IU/liter and 0.1 IU/liter, respectively, in all samples.

other_tests.date: 2 months after withdrawal of sex steroid replacement therapy
other_tests.findings: During the basal profile, LH and FSH serum levels were less than 0.1 IU/liter. During pulsatile GnRH administration, LH remained less than 0.1 IU/L and FSH levels were either 0.1 or 0.2 IU/liter.
A G to A transversion in the acceptor splice site at the intron 1-exon 2 boundary was identified in the homozygous state in the propositus.
A truncated GnRHR mRNA was identified from the patientâ€™s cDNA, confirming the deletion of exon 2.
